nodes.text: Flash was a male Trandoshan living during the Galactic War. In 3631 BBY, he fought as a gladiator in the Arena Grand of Zakuul, winning a match against the "Breaktown Brawler" Thades Gorkultok.

Flash appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire in hologram during Chapter VII: The Lady of Sorrows. Appearing only in a cutscene in which he has no lines, his name does not appear in the game itself, though it can be obtained from the game files.
